sources.title: Transylvania 6-5000 | FULL MOVIE | Jeff Goldblum | Ed Begley Jr | Vampire Frankenstein Comedy Horror
sources.description: Tabloid reporters Jack Harrison (Jeff Goldblum) and Gil Turner (Ed Begley Jr.) are sent to Transylvania with two options: find the Frankenstein monster or find new jobs. The two bumbling heroes are in for some very scary surprises!

metadata.Plot: Tabloid reporters Jack Harrison and Gil Turner are sent to Transylvania with two choices: find the Frankenstein monster or find new jobs. But before the jumpy journalists can dig up their big story, they must first face the horrors of an extremely clumsy butler, a nymphomaniac vampiress and a semi-mad doctor, as well as assorted mummies, werewolves and more Transylvanian oddballs. Can these two bumbling heroes unravel this monstrous mystery or are they in for some very scary surprises?
metadata.Actors: Jeff Goldblum, Joseph Bologna, Ed Begley Jr.
